name: Canadian North and First Air Merger APPROVED
description:
On Wednesday June 19th, the federal government approved the merger of Canadian North and First Air, two northern airlines serving the Northwest Territories and Nunavut.

The merger itself was actually announced last year, but the two airlines have been waiting for regulatory approval since then.

In today's video, I talk about the merger and the circumstances surrounding it, including a report from Canada's Competition Bureau and the airlines' lengthy response to it.

What are your thoughts on this merger? Let me know in the comments!
